::: {#tbl-bip-summary .cell tbl-cap='Summary statistics for ground balls from the 2023-2025 seasons.'}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: tbl-bip-summary
#| tbl-cap: "Summary statistics for ground balls from the 2023-2025 seasons."

bip_full <- read_rds("statcast_data/bip_gb.rds")

bip_full |>
  group_by(game_year) |>
  summarise(
    ground_balls = n(),
    successful_plays = sum(successful_play == 1, na.rm = TRUE),
    percent_successful = round(mean(successful_play, na.rm = TRUE) * 100, 2),
    outs_1b = sum(out_1b == 1, na.rm = TRUE),
    outs_2b = sum(out_2b == 1, na.rm = TRUE),
    outs_ss = sum(out_ss == 1, na.rm = TRUE),
    outs_3b = sum(out_3b == 1, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) |>
  ungroup() |>
  kable(
    booktabs = TRUE,
    col.names = c("Year", "Ground Balls", "Successful", "% Successful", "Outs by 1B", "Outs by 2B", "Outs by SS", "Outs by 3B"),
    )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}


| Year| Ground Balls| Successful| % Successful| Outs by 1B| Outs by 2B| Outs by SS| Outs by 3B|
|----:|------------:|----------:|------------:|----------:|----------:|----------:|----------:|
| 2023|        48421|      35816|        73.97|       3617|       9958|      10731|       8229|
| 2024|        48547|      35818|        73.78|       3793|      10063|      10587|       8004|
| 2025|        48102|      35534|        73.87|       3753|      10253|      10363|       7854|


:::
:::



::: {#tbl-continuous-summary .cell tbl-cap='Summary statistics for batted ball variables in the batted ball dataset.'}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: tbl-continuous-summary
#| tbl-cap: "Summary statistics for batted ball variables in the batted ball dataset."

continuous_vars <- c("launch_speed", "spray_angle", "location_x", "location_y")

bip_full |>
  select(all_of(continuous_vars)) |>
  pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = "variable", values_to = "value") |>
  mutate(variable = factor(variable, levels = continuous_vars,
                           labels = c("Exit Velocity (mph)", "Spray Angle (degrees)", "Location X (ft)", "Location Y (ft)"))) |>
  group_by(variable) |>
  summarize(
    mean = round(mean(value, na.rm = TRUE), 2),
    sd = round(sd(value, na.rm = TRUE), 2),
    min = round(min(value, na.rm = TRUE), 2),
    max = round(max(value, na.rm = TRUE), 2)
  ) |>
  kable(
    col.names = c("Variable", "Mean", "SD", "Min", "Max")
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}


|Variable              |   Mean|    SD|     Min|    Max|
|:---------------------|------:|-----:|-------:|------:|
|Exit Velocity (mph)   |  86.04| 16.52|    5.60| 120.40|
|Spray Angle (degrees) |  -1.25| 26.65|  -45.00|  45.00|
|Location X (ft)       |  -0.02| 61.82| -250.35| 246.45|
|Location Y (ft)       | 118.48| 57.62|  -70.08| 395.35|


:::
:::



::: {#cell-fig-fielder-positioning .cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-fielder-positioning
#| fig-cap: "Average fielder positioning for infielders (1B, 2B, SS, 3B) based on batted balls successfully fielded from 2023-2025 seasons. This considers all batted balls, not just ground balls."

safe_positioning <- read_rds("statcast_data/player_positioning/safe_positioning.rds")

ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = bip_full |> filter(play_made_by != "Other"), aes(x = location_x, y = location_y), alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_point(data = safe_positioning, aes(x = pos_x, y = pos_y), color = "red", size = 3) +
  facet_wrap(~ play_made_by) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank()
  )

# plot 3B
p_3b <- ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = bip_full |> filter(play_made_by == "3B"), aes(x = location_x, y = location_y), alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_point(data = safe_positioning |> filter(play_made_by == "3B"), aes(x = pos_x, y = pos_y), color = "red", size = 3) +
  annotate("rect", xmin = -63.64 - 3, xmax = -63.64 + 3, ymin = 63.64 - 3, ymax = 63.64 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  annotate("rect", xmin = -3, xmax = 3, ymin = 127.28 - 3, ymax = 127.28 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  annotate("rect", xmin = 63.64 - 3, xmax = 63.64 + 3, ymin = 63.64 - 3, ymax = 63.64 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank()
  )

p_ss <- ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = bip_full |> filter(play_made_by == "SS"), aes(x = location_x, y = location_y), alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_point(data = safe_positioning |> filter(play_made_by == "SS"), aes(x = pos_x, y = pos_y), color = "red", size = 3) +
  annotate("rect", xmin = -63.64 - 3, xmax = -63.64 + 3, ymin = 63.64 - 3, ymax = 63.64 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  annotate("rect", xmin = -3, xmax = 3, ymin = 127.28 - 3, ymax = 127.28 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  annotate("rect", xmin = 63.64 - 3, xmax = 63.64 + 3, ymin = 63.64 - 3, ymax = 63.64 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank()
  )

p_2b <- ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = bip_full |> filter(play_made_by == "2B"), aes(x = location_x, y = location_y), alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_point(data = safe_positioning |> filter(play_made_by == "2B"), aes(x = pos_x, y = pos_y), color = "red", size = 3) +
  annotate("rect", xmin = -63.64 - 3, xmax = -63.64 + 3, ymin = 63.64 - 3, ymax = 63.64 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  annotate("rect", xmin = -3, xmax = 3, ymin = 127.28 - 3, ymax = 127.28 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  annotate("rect", xmin = 63.64 - 3, xmax = 63.64 + 3, ymin = 63.64 - 3, ymax = 63.64 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank()
  )

p_1b <- ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = bip_full |> filter(play_made_by == "1B"), aes(x = location_x, y = location_y), alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_point(data = safe_positioning |> filter(play_made_by == "1B"), aes(x = pos_x, y = pos_y), color = "red", size = 3) +
  annotate("rect", xmin = -63.64 - 3, xmax = -63.64 + 3, ymin = 63.64 - 3, ymax = 63.64 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  annotate("rect", xmin = -3, xmax = 3, ymin = 127.28 - 3, ymax = 127.28 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  annotate("rect", xmin = 63.64 - 3, xmax = 63.64 + 3, ymin = 63.64 - 3, ymax = 63.64 + 3, alpha = 0.8, fill = "blue") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank()
  )

# grid arrange
library(gridExtra)
```

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-fielder-positioning
#| fig-cap: "Average fielder positioning for infielders (1B, 2B, SS, 3B) based on batted balls successfully fielded from 2023-2025 seasons. This considers all batted balls, not just ground balls."

grid.arrange(p_1b, p_2b, p_ss, p_3b, ncol = 4)
```
